title: after unsaved change the template is broken
body:
### expected behaviour
save files correctly and don't brake the theme if not

### actual behaviour
what the title sais

### steps to reproduce
1. open textfile in webinterface
2. write some text, click "save"
3. wait some seconds
4. message about unsaved changes
![2013-07-26 10_33_23-2013-07-26 10_17_33-nue txt - owncloud png - windows-fotoanzeige](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/91113/861354/22b2ab9a-f5ce-11e2-94a3-a44ab96965ea.png)
5. open file again, write some text, save.
![2013-07-26 10_17_59-nue txt _ - owncloud](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/91113/861357/46fbdcc4-f5ce-11e2-83e6-d21f9c8d3bd0.png)
6. after some times doing that it can get saved.
![2013-07-26 10_18_52-nue txt - owncloud](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/91113/861362/89443a5e-f5ce-11e2-834a-be208a47c97c.png)
it is displayed, that the file is in a folder with the name of the file. that is not true. its direct in the users folder
7. also after reloading the site its normal again


### server configuration
ubuntu 10.04
apache/2.2.14 (ubuntu)
mysql  ver 14.14 distrib 5.1.69, for debian-linux-gnu
php 5.3.2-1ubuntu4.19
owncloud enterprise edition 5.0.9

### client configuration
browser:chrome 28

operating system: windows 7 pro

### logs
nothing related

#### browser log
hadn't open and cant reproduce agaun.. sorry
